name: core_simd::ops::<impl ops::index::IndexMut<I> for core_simd::vector::Simd<T, N>>::index_mut

core_simd::vector::Simd::<T, N>::as_mut_.doc: Returns a mutable array reference containing the entire SIMD vector.

ops::index::IndexMut::index_mut.doc:
Performs the mutable indexing (`container[index]`) operation.

 # Panics

 May panic if the index is out of bounds.
